name: Light-Eater - LD39
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/light-eater

Scribble out all the lights to keep the Light-Eater from showing up to kill everyone! My entry for Ludum Dare 39 "Running out of Power." I enjoyed making this, just wish I had more time to get everything working just right, but it came out more complete than my last LD entry ^^' You'll see! Next time I'll make a completed game!

Enjoy this little number!:)
